body.gatha1: Kāmaṃ kāmayamānassa, tassa ce taṃ samijjhati;
body.gathalast: Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchati.
Te kāmā parihāyanti, sallaviddhova ruppati.
body.gatha1: Yo kāme parivajjeti, sappasseva padā siro;
body.gathalast: Thiyo bandhū puthu kāme, yo naro anugijjhati.
body.gatha1: Abalā naṃ balīyanti, maddantenaṃ parissayā;
body.gathalast: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, nāvaṃ bhinnamivodakaṃ.
body.gatha1: Tasmā jantu sadā sato, kāmāni parivajjaye;
Satto guhāyaṃ bahunābhichanno, tiṭṭhaṃ naro mohanasmiṃ pagāḷho;
body.gathalast: Dūre vivekā hi tathāvidho so, kāmā hi loke na hi suppahāyā.
body.gatha1: Icchānidānā bhavasātabaddhā, te duppamuñcā na hi aññamokkhā;
body.gathalast: Pacchā pure vāpi apekkhamānā, imeva kāme purimeva jappaṃ.
body.gatha1: Kāmesu giddhā pasutā pamūḷhā, avadāniyā te visame niviṭṭhā;
body.gathalast: Dukkhūpanītā paridevayanti, kiṃsū bhavissāma ito cutāse.
body.gatha1: Tasmā hi sikkhetha idheva jantu, yaṃ kiñci jaññā visamanti loke;
body.gathalast: Na tassa hetū visamaṃ careyya, appañhidaṃ jīvitamāhu dhīrā.
body.gatha1: Passāmi loke pariphandamānaṃ, pajaṃ imaṃ taṇhagataṃ bhavesu;
body.gathalast: Hīnā narā maccumukhe lapanti, avītataṇhāse bhavābhavesu.
body.gatha1: Mamāyite passatha phandamāne, maccheva appodake khīṇasote;
body.gathalast: Etampi disvā amamo careyya, bhavesu āsattimakubbamāno.
body.gatha1: Ubhosu antesu vineyya chandaṃ, phassaṃ pariññāya anānugiddho;
Saññaṃ pariññā vitareyya oghaṃ, pariggahesu muni nopalitto;
Vadanti ve duṭṭhamanāpi eke, athopi ve saccamanā vadanti;
body.gathalast: Vādañca jātaṃ muni no upeti, tasmā munī natthi khilo kuhiñci.
body.gatha1: Sakañhi diṭṭhiṃ kathamaccayeyya, chandānunīto ruciyā niviṭṭho;
body.gathalast: Sayaṃ samattāni pakubbamāno, yathā hi jāneyya tathā vadeyya.
Anariyadhammaṃ kusalā tamāhu, yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāva.
body.gatha1: Santo ca bhikkhu abhinibbutatto, itihanti sīlesu akatthamāno;
body.gathalast: Tamariyadhammaṃ kusalā vadanti, yassussadā natthi kuhiñci loke.
Yadattani passati ānisaṃsaṃ, taṃ nissito kuppapaṭicca santiṃ.
body.gatha1: Diṭṭhīnivesā na hi svātivattā, dhammesu niccheyya samuggahītaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tasmā naro tesu nivesanesu, nirassatī ādiyatī ca dhammaṃ.
body.gatha1: Dhonassa hi natthi kuhiñci loke, pakappitā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesu;
body.gathalast: Māyañca mānañca pahāya dhono, sa kena gaccheyya anūpayo so.
body.gatha1: Upayo hi dhammesu upeti vādaṃ, anūpayaṃ kena kathaṃ vadeyya;
Passāmi suddhaṃ paramaṃ arogaṃ, diṭṭhena saṃsuddhi narassa hoti;
Diṭṭhena ce suddhi narassa hoti, ñāṇena vā so pajahāti dukkhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Aññena so sujjhati sopadhīko, diṭṭhī hi naṃ pāva tathā vadānaṃ.
body.gatha1: Na brāhmaṇo aññato suddhimāha, diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute vā;
body.gathalast: Puññe ca pāpe ca anūpalitto, attañjaho nayidha pakubbamāno.
body.gatha1: Purimaṃ pahāya aparaṃ sitāse, ejānugā te na taranti saṅgaṃ;
Sayaṃ samādāya vatāni jantu, uccāvacaṃ gacchati saññasatto;
body.gathalast: Vidvā ca vedehi samecca dhammaṃ, na uccāvacaṃ gacchati bhūripañño.
body.gatha1: Sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto, yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;
body.gathalast: Tameva dassiṃ vivaṭaṃ carantaṃ, kenīdha lokasmi vikappayeyya.
body.gatha1: Na kappayanti na purekkharonti, accantasuddhīti na te vadanti;
body.gathalast: Ādānaganthaṃ gathitaṃ visajja, āsaṃ na kubbanti kuhiñci loke.
Na rāgarāgī na virāgaratto, tassīdha natthī paramuggahītanti.
body.gatha1: Paramanti diṭṭhīsu paribbasāno, yaduttari kurute jantu loke;
body.gathalast: Hīnāti aññe tato sabbamāha, tasmā vivādāni avītivatto.
Tadeva so tattha samuggahāya, nihīnato passati sabbamaññaṃ.
body.gatha1: Taṃ vāpi ganthaṃ kusalā vadanti, yaṃ nissito passati hīnamaññaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tasmā hi diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā, sīlabbataṃ bhikkhu na nissayeyya.
body.gatha1: Diṭṭhimpi lokasmiṃ na kappayeyya, ñāṇena vā sīlavatena vāpi;
body.gathalast: Samoti attānamanūpaneyya, hīno na maññetha visesi vāpi.
body.gatha1: Attaṃ pahāya anupādiyāno, ñāṇepi so nissayaṃ no karoti;
Yassūbhayante paṇidhīdha natthi, bhavābhavāya idha vā huraṃ vā;
body.gathalast: Nivesanā tassa na santi keci, dhammesu niccheyya samuggahītaṃ.
body.gatha1: Tassīdha diṭṭhe va sute mute vā, pakappitā natthi aṇūpi saññā;
body.gathalast: Taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ diṭṭhimanādiyānaṃ, kenīdha lokasmiṃ vikappayeyya.
body.gatha1: Na kappayanti na purekkharonti, dhammāpi tesaṃ na paṭicchitāse;
body.gathalast: Na brāhmaṇo sīlavatena neyyo, pāraṅgato na pacceti tādīti.
Yo cepi aticca jīvati, atha kho so jarasāpi miyyati.
Vinābhāvasantamevidaṃ, iti disvā nāgāramāvase.
body.gatha1: Supinena yathāpi saṅgataṃ, paṭibuddho puriso na passati;
body.gathalast: Evampi piyāyitaṃ janaṃ, petaṃ kālakataṃ na passati.
body.gatha1: nāmamevā vasissati (sī. syā. pī.);
body.gathalast: Nāmaṃyevāvasissati, akkheyyaṃ petassa jantuno.
Tasmā munayo pariggahaṃ, hitvā acariṃsu khemadassino.
body.gatha1: Patilīnacarassa bhikkhuno, bhajamānassa vivittamāsanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sāmaggiyamāhu tassa taṃ, yo attānaṃ bhavane na dassaye.
body.gatha1: Sabbattha munī anissito, na piyaṃ kubbati nopi appiyaṃ;
Udabindu yathāpi pokkhare, padume vāri yathā na limpati;
body.gathalast: Evaṃ muni nopalimpati, yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā.
body.gatha1: Dhono na hi tena maññati, yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā;
body.gathalast: Nāññena visuddhimicchati, na hi so rajjati no virajjatīti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Methunamanuyuttassa, (iccāyasmā tisso metteyyo) vighātaṃ brūhi mārisa;
body.gathalast: Sutvāna tava sāsanaṃ, viveke sikkhissāmase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Methunamanuyuttassa, (metteyyāti bhagavā) mussate vāpi sāsanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Micchā ca paṭipajjati, etaṃ tasmiṃ anāriyaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Eko pubbe caritvāna, methunaṃ yo nisevati;
body.gathalast: Yānaṃ bhantaṃ va taṃ loke, hīnamāhu puthujjanaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaso kitti ca yā pubbe, hāyate vāpi tassa sā;
body.gathalast: Etampi disvā sikkhetha, methunaṃ vippahātave.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saṅkappehi pareto so, kapaṇo viya jhāyati;
body.gathalast: Sutvā paresaṃ nigghosaṃ, maṅku hoti tathāvidho.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Atha satthāni kurute, paravādehi codito;
body.gathalast: Esa khvassa mahāgedho, mosavajjaṃ pagāhati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paṇḍitoti samaññāto, ekacariyaṃ adhiṭṭhito;
‘‘Etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā, muni pubbāpare idha;
body.gathalast: Ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā, na nisevetha methunaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vivekaññeva sikkhetha, etadariyānamuttamaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na tena seṭṭho maññetha, sa ve nibbānasantike.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Rittassa munino carato, kāmesu anapekkhino;
body.gathalast: Yaṃ nissitā tattha subhaṃ vadānā, paccekasaccesu puthū niviṭṭhā.
body.gatha1: Te vādakāmā parisaṃ vigayha, bālaṃ dahantī mithu aññamaññaṃ;
body.gathalast: Vadanti te aññasitā kathojjaṃ, pasaṃsakāmā kusalā vadānā.
body.gatha1: Yutto kathāyaṃ parisāya majjhe, pasaṃsamicchaṃ vinighāti hoti;
body.gathalast: Apāhatasmiṃ pana maṅku hoti, nindāya so kuppati randhamesī.
body.gatha1: Yamassa vādaṃ parihīnamāhu, apāhataṃ pañhavimaṃsakāse;
body.gathalast: Paridevati socati hīnavādo, upaccagā manti anutthunāti.
body.gatha1: Ete vivādā samaṇesu jātā, etesu ugghāti nighāti hoti;
body.gathalast: Etampi disvā virame kathojjaṃ, na haññadatthatthipasaṃsalābhā.
body.gatha1: Pasaṃsito vā pana tattha hoti, akkhāya vādaṃ parisāya majjhe;
body.gathalast: Etampi disvā na vivādayetha, na hi tena suddhiṃ kusalā vadanti.
body.gatha1: Sūro yathā rājakhādāya puṭṭho, abhigajjameti paṭisūramicchaṃ;
body.gathalast: Yeneva so tena palehi sūra, pubbeva natthi yadidaṃ yudhāya.
Te tvaṃ vadassū na hi tedha atthi, vādamhi jāte paṭisenikattā.
body.gatha1: Visenikatvā pana ye caranti, diṭṭhīhi diṭṭhiṃ avirujjhamānā;
body.gathalast: Tesu tvaṃ kiṃ labhetho pasūra, yesīdha natthī paramuggahītaṃ.
body.gatha1: Atha tvaṃ pavitakkamāgamā, manasā diṭṭhigatāni cintayanto;
body.gathalast: Dhonena yugaṃ samāgamā, na hi tvaṃ sakkhasi sampayātaveti.
Kimevidaṃ muttakarīsapuṇṇaṃ, pādāpi naṃ samphusituṃ na icche’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Etādisaṃ ce ratanaṃ na icchasi, nāriṃ narindehi bahūhi patthitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ajjhattasantiṃ pacinaṃ adassaṃ’’.
Kathaṃ nu dhīrehi paveditaṃ taṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na diṭṭhiyā na sutiyā na ñāṇena, (māgaṇḍiyāti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Santo anissāya bhavaṃ na jappe’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘No ce kira diṭṭhiyā na sutiyā na ñāṇena, (iti māgaṇḍiyo)
body.gathalast: Diṭṭhiyā eke paccenti suddhiṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Diṭṭhañca nissāya anupucchamāno, (māgaṇḍiyāti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Tasmā tuvaṃ momuhato dahāsi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Samo visesī uda vā nihīno, yo maññatī so vivadetha tena;
body.gathalast: Tīsu vidhāsu avikampamāno, samo visesīti na tassa hoti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saccanti so brāhmaṇo kiṃ vadeyya, musāti vā so vivadetha kena;
body.gathalast: Yasmiṃ samaṃ visamaṃ vāpi natthi, sa kena vādaṃ paṭisaṃyujeyya.
Kāmehi ritto apurekkharāno, kathaṃ na viggayha janena kayirā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yehi vivitto vicareyya loke, na tāni uggayha vadeyya nāgo;
body.gathalast: Evaṃ munī santivādo agiddho, kāme ca loke ca anūpalitto.
Na kammunā nopi sutena neyyo, anūpanīto sa nivesanesu.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saññāvirattassa na santi ganthā, paññāvimuttassa na santi mohā;
‘‘Kathaṃdassī kathaṃsīlo, upasantoti vuccati;
body.gathalast: Taṃ me gotama pabrūhi, pucchito uttamaṃ naraṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vītataṇho purā bhedā, (iti bhagavā) pubbamantamanissito;
body.gathalast: Vemajjhe nupasaṅkheyyo, tassa natthi purakkhataṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Akkodhano asantāsī, avikatthī akukkuco;
‘‘Nirāsatti anāgate, atītaṃ nānusocati;
‘‘Patilīno akuhako, apihālu amaccharī;
body.gathalast: Appagabbho ajeguccho, pesuṇeyye ca no yuto.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sātiyesu anassāvī, atimāne ca no yuto;
‘‘Lābhakamyā na sikkhati, alābhe ca na kuppati;
body.gathalast: Aviruddho ca taṇhāya, rasesu nānugijjhati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Upekkhako sadā sato, na loke maññate samaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na visesī na nīceyyo, tassa no santi ussadā.
Bhavāya vibhavāya vā, taṇhā yassa na vijjati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ brūmi upasantoti, kāmesu anapekkhinaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ganthā tassa na vijjanti, atarī so visattikaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na tassa puttā pasavo, khettaṃ vatthuñca vijjati;
‘‘Yena naṃ vajjuṃ puthujjanā, atho samaṇabrāhmaṇā;
body.gathalast: Taṃ tassa apurakkhataṃ, tasmā vādesu nejati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vītagedho amaccharī, na ussesu vadate muni;
body.gathalast: Na samesu na omesu, kappaṃ neti akappiyo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yassa loke sakaṃ natthi, asatā ca na socati;
body.gathalast: Dhammesu ca na gacchati, sa ve santoti vuccatī’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kutopahūtā kalahā vivādā, paridevasokā sahamaccharā ca;
body.gathalast: Mānātimānā sahapesuṇā ca, kutopahūtā te tadiṅgha brūhi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Piyappahūtā kalahā vivādā,
body.gathalast: Vivādajātesu ca pesuṇāni’’.
Āsā ca niṭṭhā ca kutonidānā, ye samparāyāya narassa honti’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Chandānidānāni piyāni loke, ye cāpi lobhā vicaranti loke;
body.gathalast: Āsā ca niṭṭhā ca itonidānā, ye samparāyāya narassa honti’’.
Kodho mosavajjañca kathaṃkathā ca, ye vāpi dhammā samaṇena vuttā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sātaṃ asātanti yamāhu loke, tamūpanissāya pahoti chando;
body.gathalast: kurute (bahūsu)jantu loke.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kodho mosavajjañca kathaṃkathā ca, etepi dhammā dvayameva sante;
body.gathalast: Kathaṃkathī ñāṇapathāya sikkhe, ñatvā pavuttā samaṇena dhammā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sātaṃ asātañca kutonidānā, kismiṃ asante na bhavanti hete;
body.gathalast: Vibhavaṃ bhavañcāpi yametamatthaṃ, etaṃ me pabrūhi yatonidānaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Phassanidānaṃ sātaṃ asātaṃ, phasse asante na bhavanti hete;
body.gathalast: Vibhavaṃ bhavañcāpi yametamatthaṃ, etaṃ te pabrūmi itonidānaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Phasso nu lokasmi kutonidāno, pariggahā cāpi kutopahūtā;
body.gathalast: Kismiṃ asante na mamattamatthi, kismiṃ vibhūte na phusanti phassā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nāmañca rūpañca paṭicca phasso, icchānidānāni pariggahāni;
body.gathalast: Icchāyasantyā na mamattamatthi, rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na saññasaññī na visaññasaññī, nopi asaññī na vibhūtasaññī;
body.gathalast: Evaṃsametassa vibhoti rūpaṃ, saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ taṃ apucchimha akittayī no,
body.gathalast: Udāhu aññampi vadanti etto.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ettāvataggampi vadanti heke, yakkhassa suddhiṃ idha paṇḍitāse;
body.gathalast: Tesaṃ paneke samayaṃ vadanti, anupādisese kusalā vadānā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ete ca ñatvā upanissitāti, ñatvā munī nissaye so vimaṃsī;
body.gathalast: Ñatvā vimutto na vivādameti, bhavābhavāya na sameti dhīro’’ti.
body.gatha1: Sakaṃsakaṃdiṭṭhiparibbasānā, viggayha nānā kusalā vadanti;
body.gathalast: Yo evaṃ jānāti sa vedi dhammaṃ, idaṃ paṭikkosamakevalī so.
Sacco nu vādo katamo imesaṃ, sabbeva hīme kusalā vadānā.
Sabbeva bālā sunihīnapaññā, sabbevime diṭṭhiparibbasānā.
body.gatha1: Sandiṭṭhiyā ceva na vīvadātā, saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutīmā;
body.gathalast: Sakaṃsakaṃdiṭṭhimakaṃsu saccaṃ, tasmā hi bāloti paraṃ dahanti.
Evampi vigayha vivādayanti, kasmā na ekaṃ samaṇā vadanti.
body.gatha1: Ekañhi saccaṃ na dutīyamatthi, yasmiṃ pajā no vivade pajānaṃ;
body.gathalast: nānāto (ka.)saccāni sayaṃ thunanti, tasmā na ekaṃ samaṇā vadanti.
body.gatha1: Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā, pavādiyāse kusalā vadānā;
body.gathalast: Saccāni sutāni bahūni nānā, udāhu te takkamanussaranti.
body.gatha1: Na heva saccāni bahūni nānā, aññatra saññāya niccāni loke;
body.gathalast: Takkañca diṭṭhīsu pakappayitvā, saccaṃ musāti dvayadhammamāhu.
body.gatha1: Diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute vā, ete ca nissāya vimānadassī;
body.gathalast: Vinicchaye ṭhatvā pahassamāno, bālo paro akkusaloti cāha.
body.gatha1: Yeneva bāloti paraṃ dahāti, tenātumānaṃ kusaloti cāha;
body.gathalast: Sayamattanā so kusalo vadāno, aññaṃ vimāneti tadeva pāva.
body.gatha1: Atisāradiṭṭhiyāva so samatto, mānena matto paripuṇṇamānī;
body.gathalast: Sayameva sāmaṃ manasābhisitto, diṭṭhī hi sā tassa tathā samattā.
body.gatha1: Parassa ce hi vacasā nihīno, tumo sahā hoti nihīnapañño;
body.gathalast: Atha ce sayaṃ vedagū hoti dhīro, na koci bālo samaṇesu atthi.
body.gatha1: suddhimakevalīno (sī.);
Idheva suddhi iti vādayanti, nāññesu dhammesu visuddhimāhu;
body.gathalast: Evampi titthyā puthuso niviṭṭhā, sakāyane tattha daḷhaṃ vadānā.
body.gatha1: Sakāyane vāpi daḷhaṃ vadāno, kamettha bāloti paraṃ daheyya;
body.gathalast: Hitvāna sabbāni vinicchayāni, na medhagaṃ kubbati jantu loketi.
Sabbeva te nindamanvānayanti, atho pasaṃsampi labhanti tattha.
body.gatha1: Appañhi etaṃ na alaṃ samāya, duve vivādassa phalāni brūmi;
body.gathalast: Etampi disvā na vivādayetha, khemābhipassaṃ avivādabhūmiṃ.
body.gatha1: Yā kācimā sammutiyo puthujjā, sabbāva etā na upeti vidvā;
body.gathalast: Anūpayo so upayaṃ kimeyya, diṭṭhe sute khantimakubbamāno.
body.gatha1: Sīluttamā saññamenāhu suddhiṃ, vataṃ samādāya upaṭṭhitāse;
body.gathalast: Idheva sikkhema athassa suddhiṃ, bhavūpanītā kusalā vadānā.
Pajappatī patthayatī ca suddhiṃ, satthāva hīno pavasaṃ gharamhā.
body.gatha1: Sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabbaṃ, kammañca sāvajjanavajjametaṃ;
body.gathalast: Suddhiṃ asuddhinti apatthayāno, virato care santimanuggahāya.
body.gatha1: Tamūpanissāya jigucchitaṃ vā, athavāpi diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;
body.gathalast: Uddhaṃsarā suddhimanutthunanti, avītataṇhāse bhavābhavesu.
body.gatha1: Patthayamānassa hi jappitāni, pavedhitaṃ vāpi pakappitesu;
Yamāhu dhammaṃ paramanti eke, tameva hīnanti panāhu aññe;
body.paragraph: Sacco nu vādo katamo imesaṃ, sabbeva hīme kusalā vadānā.
body.gatha1: Sakañhi dhammaṃ paripuṇṇamāhu, aññassa dhammaṃ pana hīnamāhu;
body.gathalast: Evampi viggayha vivādayanti, sakaṃ sakaṃ sammutimāhu saccaṃ.
body.gatha1: Parassa ce vambhayitena hīno, na koci dhammesu visesi assa;
body.gathalast: Puthū hi aññassa vadanti dhammaṃ, nihīnato samhi daḷhaṃ vadānā.
body.gatha1: Saddhammapūjāpi nesaṃ tatheva, yathā pasaṃsanti sakāyanāni;
Na brāhmaṇassa paraneyyamatthi, dhammesu niccheyya samuggahītaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tasmā vivādāni upātivatto, na hi seṭṭhato passati dhammamaññaṃ.
body.gatha1: Jānāmi passāmi tatheva etaṃ, diṭṭhiyā eke paccenti suddhiṃ;
body.gathalast: Addakkhi ce kiñhi tumassa tena, atisitvā aññena vadanti suddhiṃ.
Kāmaṃ bahuṃ passatu appakaṃ vā, na hi tena suddhiṃ kusalā vadanti.
body.gatha1: Nivissavādī na hi subbināyo, pakappitaṃ diṭṭhi purekkharāno;
body.gathalast: Yaṃ nissito tattha subhaṃ vadāno, suddhiṃvado tattha tathaddasā so.
body.gatha1: Vissajja ganthāni munīdha loke, vivādajātesu na vaggasārī;
body.gathalast: Santo asantesu upekkhako so, anuggaho uggahaṇanti maññe.
body.gatha1: Pubbāsave hitvā nave akubbaṃ, na chandagū nopi nivissavādī;
Sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto, yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā;
body.gathalast: Sa pannabhāro muni vippamutto, na kappiyo nūparato na patthiyoti.
Kathaṃ disvā nibbāti bhikkhu, anupādiyāno lokasmiṃ kiñci’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mūlaṃ papañcasaṅkhāya, (iti bhagavā)
‘‘Yaṃ kiñci dhammamabhijaññā, ajjhattaṃ athavāpi bahiddhā;
body.gathalast: mānaṃ (sī. ka.)kubbetha, na hi sā nibbuti sataṃ vuttā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Seyyo na tena maññeyya, nīceyyo athavāpi sarikkho;
‘‘Ajjhattamevupasame , na aññato bhikkhu santimeseyya;
body.gathalast: Ajjhattaṃ upasantassa, natthi attā kuto nirattā vā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Majjhe yathā samuddassa, ūmi no jāyatī ṭhito hoti;
body.gathalast: Evaṃ ṭhito anejassa, ussadaṃ bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñci’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Akittayī vivaṭacakkhu, sakkhidhammaṃ parissayavinayaṃ;
body.gathalast: Paṭipadaṃ vadehi bhaddante, pātimokkhaṃ athavāpi samādhiṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Cakkhūhi neva lolassa, gāmakathāya āvaraye sotaṃ;
body.gathalast: Rase ca nānugijjheyya, na ca mamāyetha kiñci lokasmiṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Phassena yadā phuṭṭhassa, paridevaṃ bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñcñcci;
body.gathalast: Bhavañca nābhijappeyya, bheravesu ca na sampavedheyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Annānamatho pānānaṃ, khādanīyānaṃ athopi vatthānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Laddhā na sannidhiṃ kayirā, na ca parittase tāni alabhamāno.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Jhāyī na pādalolassa, virame kukkuccā nappamajjeyya;
body.gathalast: Athāsanesu sayanesu, appasaddesu bhikkhu vihareyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Niddaṃ na bahulīkareyya, jāgariyaṃ bhajeyya ātāpī;
body.gathalast: Tandiṃ māyaṃ hassaṃ khiḍḍaṃ, methunaṃ vippajahe savibhūsaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Āthabbaṇaṃ supinaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, no vidahe athopi nakkhattaṃ;
body.gathalast: Virutañca gabbhakaraṇaṃ, tikicchaṃ māmako na seveyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nindāya nappavedheyya, na uṇṇameyya pasaṃsito bhikkhu;
body.gathalast: Lobhaṃ saha macchariyena, kodhaṃ pesuṇiyañca panudeyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kayavikkaye na tiṭṭheyya, upavādaṃ bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñci;
body.gathalast: Gāme ca nābhisajjeyya, lābhakamyā janaṃ na lapayeyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na ca katthitā siyā bhikkhu, na ca vācaṃ payuttaṃ bhāseyya;
body.gathalast: Pāgabbhiyaṃ na sikkheyya, kathaṃ viggāhikaṃ na kathayeyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mosavajje na nīyetha, sampajāno saṭhāni na kayirā;
body.gathalast: Atha jīvitena paññāya, sīlabbatena nāññamatimaññe.
Pharusena ne na paṭivajjā, na hi santo paṭisenikaronti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Etañca dhammamaññāya, vicinaṃ bhikkhu sadā sato sikkhe;
body.gathalast: Santīti nibbutiṃ ñatvā, sāsane gotamassa na pamajjeyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Abhibhū hi so anabhibhūto, sakkhidhammamanītihamadassī;
body.gathalast: Tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsane, appamatto sadā namassamanusikkhe’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Attadaṇḍā bhayaṃ jātaṃ, janaṃ passatha medhagaṃ;
body.gathalast: Saṃvegaṃ kittayissāmi, yathā saṃvijitaṃ mayā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Phandamānaṃ pajaṃ disvā, macche appodake yathā;
body.gathalast: Aññamaññehi byāruddhe, disvā maṃ bhayamāvisi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Samantamasāro loko, disā sabbā sameritā;
body.gathalast: Icchaṃ bhavanamattano, nāddasāsiṃ anositaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Osānetveva byāruddhe, disvā me aratī ahu;
body.gathalast: Athettha sallamaddakkhiṃ, duddasaṃ hadayanissitaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yena sallena otiṇṇo, disā sabbā vidhāvati;
body.gathalast: Tameva sallamabbuyha, na dhāvati na sīdati.
body.gatha2: Na tesu pasuto siyā, nibbijjha sabbaso kāme;
body.gathalast: Sikkhe nibbānamattano.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sacco siyā appagabbho, amāyo rittapesuṇo;
body.gathalast: Akkodhano lobhapāpaṃ, vevicchaṃ vitare muni.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Niddaṃ tandiṃ sahe thīnaṃ, pamādena na saṃvase;
body.gathalast: Atimāne na tiṭṭheyya, nibbānamanaso naro.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mosavajje na nīyetha, rūpe snehaṃ na kubbaye;
body.gathalast: Mānañca parijāneyya, sāhasā virato care.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Purāṇaṃ nābhinandeyya, nave khantiṃ na kubbaye;
body.gathalast: Hiyyamāne na soceyya, ākāsaṃ na sito siyā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Gedhaṃ brūmi mahoghoti, ājavaṃ brūmi jappanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ārammaṇaṃ pakappanaṃ, kāmapaṅko duraccayo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sa ve vidvā sa vedagū, ñatvā dhammaṃ anissito;
body.gathalast: Sammā so loke iriyāno, na pihetīdha kassaci.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yodha kāme accatari, saṅgaṃ loke duraccayaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na so socati nājjheti, chinnasoto abandhano.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṃ, yassa natthi mamāyitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Asatā ca na socati, sa ve loke na jīyati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yassa natthi idaṃ meti, paresaṃ vāpi kiñcanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Mamattaṃ so asaṃvindaṃ, natthi meti na socati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Aniṭṭhurī ananugiddho, anejo sabbadhī samo;
body.gathalast: Tamānisaṃsaṃ pabrūmi, pucchito avikampinaṃ.
Virato so viyārabbhā, khemaṃ passati sabbadhi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na samesu na omesu, na ussesu vadate muni;
body.gathalast: Santo so vītamaccharo, nādeti na nirassatī’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na me diṭṭho ito pubbe, (iccāyasmā sāriputto)
body.gathalast: Tusitā gaṇimāgato.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sadevakassa lokassa, yathā dissati cakkhumā;
body.gathalast: Sabbaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā, ekova ratimajjhagā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ buddhaṃ asitaṃ tādiṃ, akuhaṃ gaṇimāgataṃ;
body.gathalast: Bahūnamidha baddhānaṃ, atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Bhikkhuno vijigucchato, bhajato rittamāsanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Rukkhamūlaṃ susānaṃ vā, pabbatānaṃ guhāsu vā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Uccāvacesu sayanesu, kīvanto tattha bheravā;
body.gathalast: Yehi bhikkhu na vedheyya, nigghose sayanāsane.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Katī parissayā loke, gacchato agataṃ disaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ye bhikkhu abhisambhave, pantamhi sayanāsane.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kyāssa byappathayo assu, kyāssassu idha gocarā;
body.gathalast: Kāni sīlabbatānāssu, pahitattassa bhikkhuno.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kaṃ so sikkhaṃ samādāya, ekodi nipako sato;
body.gathalast: Kammāro rajatasseva, niddhame malamattano’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vijigucchamānassa yadidaṃ phāsu, (sāriputtāti bhagavā)
body.gathalast: Taṃ te pavakkhāmi yathā pajānaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pañcannaṃ dhīro bhayānaṃ na bhāye, bhikkhu sato sapariyantacārī;
body.gathalast: Ḍaṃsādhipātānaṃ sarīsapānaṃ, manussaphassānaṃ catuppadānaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paradhammikānampi na santaseyya, disvāpi tesaṃ bahubheravāni;
body.gathalast: Athāparāni abhisambhaveyya, parissayāni kusalānuesī.
So tehi phuṭṭho bahudhā anoko, vīriyaṃ parakkammadaḷhaṃ kareyya.
Yadāvilattaṃ manaso vijaññā, kaṇhassa pakkhoti vinodayeyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kodhātimānassa vasaṃ na gacche, mūlampi tesaṃ palikhañña tiṭṭhe;
body.gathalast: Athappiyaṃ vā pana appiyaṃ vā, addhā bhavanto abhisambhaveyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paññaṃ purakkhatvā kalyāṇapīti, vikkhambhaye tāni parissayāni;
body.gathalast: Aratiṃ sahetha sayanamhi pante, caturo sahetha paridevadhamme.
Ete vitakke paridevaneyye, vinayetha sekho aniketacārī.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Annañca laddhā vasanañca kāle, mattaṃ so jaññā idha tosanatthaṃ;
body.gathalast: So tesu gutto yatacāri gāme, rusitopi vācaṃ pharusaṃ na vajjā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Okkhittacakkhu na ca pādalolo, jhānānuyutto bahujāgarassa;
body.gathalast: Upekkhamārabbha samāhitatto, takkāsayaṃ kukkucciyūpachinde.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Cudito vacībhi satimābhinande, sabrahmacārīsu khilaṃ pabhinde;
body.gathalast: Vācaṃ pamuñce kusalaṃ nātivelaṃ, janavādadhammāya na cetayeyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Athāparaṃ pañca rajāni loke, yesaṃ satīmā vinayāya sikkhe;
body.gathalast: Rūpesu saddesu atho rasesu, gandhesu phassesu sahetha rāgaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Etesu dhammesu vineyya chandaṃ, bhikkhu satimā suvimuttacitto;
body.gathalast: Ekodibhūto vihane tamaṃ so’’ti.
body.gatha1: Kāmaṃ guhañca duṭṭhā ca, suddhañca paramā jarā;
body.gathalast: Metteyyo ca pasūro ca, māgaṇḍi purābhedanaṃ.
Iti etāni suttāni, sabbānaṭṭhakavaggikāti.
